text: Cedars-Sinai Medical Center is a non-profit, tertiary 886-bed hospital and academic health science center. It is located in Beverly Grove in the Mid-City West area of Los Angeles, California. The hospital has a staff of over 2,000 physicians and 10,000 employees. ==References== Category:University hospitals in the United States Category:Non-profit organizations of California
title: Cedars-Sinai Medical Center
